Task 1
1.
```{r}
x = runif(100, min = 20, max = 70)
My_data <- data.frame(x=x, 
                      y = 5+3*x + 2*rnorm(100))
plot(My_data)
#2
LL_lines <- function(params){
  m = params[1]
  b = params[2]
  sigma = params[3]
  sum(log(dnorm(My_data$y - (m * My_data$x + b), sd = sigma)))
}
#4
testA <- c(3,5,2)
testB <- c(4,1,10)
LL_lines(testA)
LL_lines(testB)
#5
starting_params <- c(4, 1, 10)
best <- optim(starting_params, LL_lines, control=list(fnscale = -1))
best
```
